title: The Marvelous Adventures of Frank Gonzales, the Baking Guide

story.text: Frank Gonzales discovers an ancient recipe book hidden in his late wife's baking supplies, containing mysterious symbols alongside traditional recipes.
While baking a mysterious pie from the recipe book, Frank accidentally activates its magical properties, granting him the power to navigate through time.
Frank uses his newfound power to travel back to Tuesday and rescues a neighbourhood kid stuck in a tree, before anyone notices the child's plight.
Using his knowledge of the local history from his guiding days, Frank safeguards historical artefacts that are about to be stolen, guiding them to safety unseen.
Frank teaches a group of troubled local teenagers the art of baking, subtly imparting wisdom and guidance, fostering a sense of accomplishment and community.
Frank travels back a few days to tweak his actionsâ€”perfecting the safety and impact of both his recipes and his interventions during the week.
Satisfied with his week's adventures, Frank hosts a big bake sale, using his magical and historical insights to produce enchanting pastries that hint at his secret life.

ending: As the sun sets, Frank sits back with a pie, content that he has kneaded goodness into the fabric of time itself.
moral: No matter the age, one can always mix a bit of magic into their daily life and share the sweetness with the world.
